Welcome!

Thank you for visiting my site. My name is Rich Hanna and, while there are a few others out there, I’m doing my best to be the most “Google-able” one.

This site serves professional content of my portfolio as well as some of my hobbies and interests. It’s a pleasure to connect with you.
